selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as required by the problem statement.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final answer in the format 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: read_angle_from_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the measure of a specified angle from a geometric diagram.
edge_cases: Diagram does not clearly label angles
Multiple angles labeled with the same identifier

new_skill_specs.name: map_angle_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the measured angle to the correct option from the provided choices.
edge_cases: Angle measure does not match any option
Multiple options with the same value
